metadata.title: CVE-2024-46833 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: hns3: void array out of bound when loop tnl_numWhen query reg inf of SSU, it loops tnl_num times. However, tnl_num comesfrom hardware and the length of array is a fixed value. To void array outof bound, make sure the loop time is not greater than the length of array

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
